Package com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.view

View components used by the OAHTMLTextPane.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockDialog
    Used to edit document paragraphs (blocks).
    ColorChooser
    Color chooser used by HTML Editor
    ColorMenu  
    FontDialog  
    HtmlDebug
    Used for testing and viewing OAHTML* classes.
    HtmlSourceDialog
    Dialog used to display HTML source code.
    InsertDialog
    Dialoge used to insert html, attribute into HTML document.
    InsertFieldDialog  
    InsertHyperlinkDialog  
    InsertImageDialog  
    InsertMailtoDialog  
    InvisibleView
    A view to hide HTML tags (e.g.
    MyImageView
    View of an Image, intended to support the HTML <IMG> tag.
    OACaret
    Custom caret used by HTMLEditor
    PrintBoxView
    This is the rootView for creating a fixed width OAHTMLTextPane that is going to be printed.
    TableDialog
    Used to insert an HTML table into HTML document.
